post.body: Finally realizing what Gandhi said is true 'To see the change be the change' and working for ur country is Imp!
Thanks I din't know this! ;)
good question, why r they not on top?
Lets stand up 4 wat we believe, time to wrk for our Country!
Let's be united now and work on action plans like 1) Demand extradition of Dawood Ibrahim from Pakistan, else We All stop paying taxes!

is thanking everyone for wishes & Safety concern, trust me we are back and many many (I mean a lot) of us are going out tonight!

is wondering where will we go for coffee or drinks now as two of our life time fav. joints in Bombay The Taj & Trident have been destroyed!

Mike is wishing everyone a Super Diwali and Magical times ahead :)

is thanking all the kool humas who made Frieze, Zoo and Scope Art fair worth visiting in London, a fantastic week :)

is asking everyone, if anyone is going to Shanghai Biennale or ShContemporary from 7th to 14th September if yes let's meet up?
